title: Gross disposable household income per head

editions.title: Gross disposable household income per head
editions.summary: Estimate of the amount of money each individual within a household has available for spending or saving after they have paid taxes and received any direct benefits, UK, 1997-2021.
editions.description: This dataset shows an estimate of the amount of money each individual within a household has available for spending or saving after they have paid taxes and received any direct benefits, in the UK, for 1997-2021.
editions.creator: https://staging.idpd.uk/publishers/office-for-national-statistics
